method.name: setPlotMSAveraging
method.description: Sets the MS averaging parameters for the plot at the given index, using individual flags and values. Baseline and antenna averaging are mutually exclusive; only one (or none) can be true at the same time. If updateImmediately is true, this change takes effect immediately IF the plotms window is currently shown; otherwise it will only be applied next time update() and/or show() is called.

param.name: channel
param.description: channel averaging; either blank or a channel value

param.name: time
param.description: time averaging; either blank or a value in seconds

param.name: scan
param.description: scan averaging (only valid if time averaging is on)

param.name: field
param.description: field averaging (only valid if time averaging is on)

param.name: baseline
param.description: baseline averaging, mutually exclusive with antenna

param.name: antenna
param.description: antenna averaging, mutually exclusive with baseline

param.name: spw
param.description: spw averaging

param.name: scalar
param.description: Do scalar averaging instead of vector averaging

param.name: updateImmediately
param.description: whether to apply this change immediately, IF the window is currently shown

param.name: plotIndex
param.description: the index of the plot to apply this change

method.name: setPlotMSAveragingRec
method.description: Sets the MS averaging parameters for the plot at the given index, using a record (see PlotMSAveraging::toRecord()). If updateImmediately is true, this change takes effect immediately IF the plotms window is currently shown; otherwise it will only be applied next time update() and/or show() is called.

param.name: averaging
param.description: MS averaging parameters, in record form

param.name: updateImmediately
param.description: whether to apply this change immediately, IF the window is currently shown

param.name: plotIndex
param.description: the index of the plot to apply this change

method.name: getPlotMSAveraging
method.description: Gets the MS averaging parameters for the plot at the given index as a record (see PlotMSAveraging::toRecord()).

param.name: plotIndex
param.description: the index of the plot to get the value for

returns.description: MS averaging parameters, in record form

method.name: setPlotMSTransformations
method.description: Sets the MS transformation parameters for the plot at the given index, using individual values. Supported transformations currently include frequency frame choices (TOPO,GEO,BARY,LSRK,LSRD), velocity definition choices (RADIO, OPTICAL,TRUE) and rest frequency, and phase center shift. If updateImmediately is true, this change takes effect immediately IF the plotms window is currently shown; otherwise it will only be applied next time update() and/or show() is called.

param.name: freqframe
param.description: Frequency frame in which to render frequencies and velocities

param.name: veldef
param.description: Velocity definition in which to render velocities

param.name: restfreq
param.description: Rest frequency (w/ units) to use when calculating velocities

param.name: xshift
param.description: Phase center shift in horizontal direction (arcsec)

param.name: yshift
param.description: Phase center shift in vertical direction (arcsec)

param.name: updateImmediately
param.description: whether to apply this change immediately, IF the window is currently shown

param.name: plotIndex
param.description: the index of the plot to apply this change

method.name: setPlotMSTransformationsRec
method.description: Sets the MS transformations parameters for the plot at the given index, using a record (see PlotMSTransformations::toRecord()). If updateImmediately is true, this change takes effect immediately IF the plotms window is currently shown; otherwise it will only be applied next time update() and/or show() is called.

param.name: transformations
param.description: MS averaging parameters, in record form

param.name: updateImmediately
param.description: whether to apply this change immediately, IF the window is currently shown

param.name: plotIndex
param.description: the index of the plot to apply this change

method.name: getPlotMSTransformations
method.description: Gets the MS transformations parameters for the plot at the given index as a record (see PlotMSTransformations::toRecord()).

param.name: plotIndex
param.description: the index of the plot to get the value for

returns.description: MS transformations parameters, in record form
